message:
SYSTEM: 03.Vocabularios-LD_v5.pdf: Página 93
Semantic Technologies in the Web of Data.  Red.es.   4th December 2012 
The Public Contracts Ontology 
• The Public Contracts Ontology serves to express structured 
data about public contracts in RDF  
• The ontology enables seamless exchange of semantically 
annotated data across distributed data sources.  
• It is developed by the Czech OpenData initiative.  
• Public Contracts Ontology reuses parts of several established 
vocabularies and ontologies, such as 
• GoodRelations for modelling price specifications 
• Other vocabularies are aligned with the ontology via mappings, 
for example 
• Call for Anything, a vocabulary expressing demands 
95 
•
http://code.google.com/p/public-contracts-ontology/ 
•
http://data.gov.uk/resources/payments
